footer.tagline: Bringing joy to dogs and their owners through the excitement of agility competitions.

hero.title: Welcome to DoggyRace
hero.subtitle: Where Every Dog is a Champion
hero.description: Join us in the exciting world of dog agility competitions. Experience the thrill of watching these amazing athletes compete and showcase their skills.

info.title: About DoggyRace
info.subtitle: Your Premier Dog Agility Competition Platform

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We are dedicated to promoting the sport of dog agility and creating a vibrant community of dog enthusiasts. Our platform connects handlers, trainers, and spectators, making agility competitions more accessible and enjoyable for everyone.

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: The well-being of all dogs and handlers is our top priority

community.title: Community
community.description: Building strong connections between dog sport enthusiasts

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Promoting the highest standards in dog agility sports

join.title: Join Our Community
join.description: Whether you're a beginner or an experienced handler, there's a place for you at DoggyRace

courses.title: Our Courses & Disciplines
courses.subtitle: Discover our range of training programs

agility.title: Dog Agility
agility.description: Master obstacle courses with speed and precision

obedience.title: Obedience Training
obedience.description: Build a strong foundation of commands and control

rally.title: Rally Obedience
rally.description: Combine agility with obedience in dynamic courses

freestyle.title: Canine Freestyle
freestyle.description: Creative routines combining obedience and dance

puppy.title: Puppy Training
puppy.description: Early socialization and basic training for young dogs

tricks.title: Advanced Tricks
tricks.description: Learn impressive tricks and complex behaviors

therapy.title: Therapy Dog Training
therapy.description: Prepare your dog for therapeutic work and certifications

sponsors.subtitle: Meet the companies that support our mission and make our events possible
sponsors.title: Our Sponsors

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team
